title: OCE Merch Store Bugged?

embed.description: Warring Kingdoms Vi, Dragonblade Talon, Firecracker Jinx, Panda Annie and Dragonblade Riven take on the new year together as Special Edition set #3 in the Team Mini line.

body:
The merch store has no options for shipping to New Zealand, when in the checkout.  Australia works fine. Am I missing something? Or is it just me?
You can select "new zealand", but cant choose shipping method.

Xayah and Rakan keychain is out of stock and New Zealand never got to buy it for valentines day. :(

replies.body:
I'm afraid I don't really have any info for you here, you're probably better off submitting a ticket to Player Support, hopefully they can help you out with this one.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
